HotelElement.Name: Holiday Inn Express NEW YORK - MANHATTAN WEST SIDE

Description.Text: Dear Guest, It is our pleasure to welcome you to Holiday Inn Express Manhattan West Side. We strive to provide you a room that is clean and comfortable, with friendly attentive service at a value conscious price. Situated in Midtown West, we are located near some of Manhattans most unique attractions: the Hudson River, Chelsea Piers, the Intrepid Sea Air and Space Museum, the New York Magazine Museum, and many more. If that is not enough, our team is wholeheartedly committed in offering a diverse array of amenities to make our guests experience truly enjoyable. Our friendly staff is pleased to be of service and offer recommendations on superb restaurants, lounges, nightlife activities, high-end galleries, and shops – all within either a walking distance of the hotel or a quick subway/ bus ride away. Pamper yourself in our fully equipped 24-hour fitness center. Take advantage of our complimentary hi-speed wireless internet as well as our 24-hour business center with a printer for your convenience. Use our 24-hour sundry shop for a late night snack. Should you need any additional supplies, there are several retail and service stores within walking distance from the hotel. We want you to enjoy every day of every stay so we pledge to your our service guarantee. Should you require any additional help or information during your stay with us, please do not hesitate to contact the Front Desk, or dial “0.” Our team will be happy to assist you at any time.
